input.sentences: my friends and i decided to go mountain biking for the weekend .
we pitched our tents rather quickly so we had more time to hit the trails .
i decided to take an easy route first .
the trails were long and rocky | which provided more than enough entertainment well into the night .
by the time the sun had fully gone down | my friends and i were gleefully tired .
output.sentences: This weekend a couple of friends with mountain biking.
After some time setting up their tents, They took to the trails.
They decided to do some easy routes first.
The rocky trails provided them with some great exercise.
They were tired by the time the sun went down.
